1.0.0.name: wordpress/wooshare
1.0.0.description:
WooShare lets you add share links to the bottom of each of your posts. Every link has: * Name (required) * Image (optional) * Text (optional) * Title (optional) * URL (required)

Every share link can include post meta such as title, author, etc., and a link to the post or blog.
